events.title: Encirclement of Millerowo
events.description: German tank forces encircle soviet forces.
events.quote: The only encirclement happened on july 17th near Millerowo.

events.title: Crossing of the Don
events.quote: Infantry companies of LI. Corps cross the Don and create a bridgehead close to the village of Lutschinskoi [sic]. A complete battalion crosses at Wertjatschi.

events.title: Reaching the Volga
events.quote: German forces reach Rynok around 16:00 where the soldiers of the 16th tank division see the Volga.
